items.sentence: Tom saw Mary standing at the top of the stairs in her pajamas.
Tom saw people starting to leave, so he decided to leave, too.
Tom handed me a piece of paper with his address written on it.
Tom\'s cat is always waiting at the door when he arrives home.
Tom\'s house was struck by lightning and burned to the ground.
Tom\'s parents were disappointed when they saw his test score.
We often eat lunch at that small restaurant around the corner.
Tom is afraid because he doesn\'t understand what\'s going on.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will ever be satisfied.
I suppose you know why Tom didn\'t do what we asked him to do.
